T12D4302:351a-15: khyod kyang 'dod pa'i yul ni thob cing mdzes pa'i char sprin tshogs 'dzin dpal dang ldan pa dang //
T12D4302:351a-16: glog ma dang yang nam yang mi 'bral gyur cig
T12D4302:351a-17: de bzhin kun kyang dge zhing shis gyur cig /
T12D4302:351a-18: snyan ngag mkhan chen po nag mo'i khol gyis mdzad
T12D4302:351a-19: pa'i sprin gyi po nya rdzogs so /
T12D4302:351a-21: // / blo gros dang snying rje dang /
T12D4302:351a-22: brtul ba dang nges pa dang /
T12D4302:351a-23: gtong ba la sogs pa'i yon tan phul du phyung
T12D4302:351a-24: ba dpag tu med pas spras pa'i dpon chen nam
T12D4302:351a-25: mkha' brtan pa'i bka' lung gis /
T12D4302:351a-26: kha che'i pandi ta snyan ngag mkhan chen po su man shr'i dang /
T12D4302:351a-27: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba mang du thos pa'i dge slong byang chub rtse mo dang /
T12D4302:351a-28: lo ts'a bar gtogs pa lung rigs smra ba nam
T12D4302:351a-29: mkha' bzang pos dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen
T12D4302:351a-30: por bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
T12D4302:351a-31: gang zhig thugs dgongs rnam par dag pa yis //
T12D4302:351a-32: 'di la bskul zhing mthun rkyen bsgrubs pa dang //
T12D4302:351a-33: bdag cag 'bad las bsod nams gang bsgrubs pas //
T12D4302:351a-34: 'khor ba las rgal sku gsum thob par shog / byang gi bdag po'i gsung bzang las //
T12D4302:351a-35: snyan ngag 'di ni bod skad du //
T12D4302:351a-36: kha che pan chen dang lhan cig / dge slong byang chub rtse mos bsgyur //
